parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Georgeta Dogaru - candidatǎ la Senat pentru Dâmbovița din partea partidului REPER". This clearly identifies a specific candidate participating in the senatorial elections.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting parameters (age, gender, location) further confirm this intention.  The call to action "Votați REPER pe 1 decembrie în Dâmbovița!" directly addresses voters in Dâmbovița County.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters in Dâmbovița County to vote for Georgeta Dogaru and, by extension, the REPER party. The phrasing "Votați REPER" is a direct call to action aimed at influencing electoral behavior.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It does not present objective information or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and party, advocating for a particular electoral outcome.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clear and direct endorsement of a candidate and party within the context of an electoral campaign.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1260800031733382</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id "1260800031733382", constitutes electoral propaganda.  It fulfills all the criteria outlined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006: it refers directly to a specific candidate (Georgeta Dogaru), it was published during the electoral campaign period (as evidenced by the start and end dates), it has a clear electoral objective (to garner votes for REPER), and it surpasses the boundaries of journalistic reporting by being a direct endorsement. The post's paid nature and targeting parameters further solidify its intention to influence voters.  While the post doesn't explicitly violate Article 98 t) by advising voters *at* polling stations, it does violate the spirit of the law by continuing electoral propaganda after the official campaign period (assuming the post was published after the official end date). The fact that it's a paid advertisement targeting a specific demographic in a specific region makes it a clear attempt to influence the election.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Georgeta Dogaru</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
REPER Dâmbovița, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 a unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1260800031733382), cu mesajul "Georgeta Dogaru - candidatǎ la Senat pentru Dâmbovița din partea partidului REPER. Votați REPER pe 1 decembrie în Dâmbovița!",  având ca efect electoral promovarea directă a candidatei Georgeta Dogaru și a partidului REPER, influențând votul alegătorilor din județul Dâmbovița.  Reclama, cu o cheltuială de sub 100 RON, a vizat o audiență estimată între 50.000 și 100.000 de persoane, în principal femei cu vârste între 38 și 65 de ani din județul Dâmbovița, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Contact: steluta.munteanu@partidulreper.ro, +40720412010.  Mesajul, lipsit de caracter jurnalistic, constituie propagandă electorală clară, interzisă după încheierea campaniei electorale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
